data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Vanenga Schaus, 1928 (Lepidoptera, Mimallonoidea, Mimallonidae) with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article St. Laurent, Ryan A., Herbin, Daniel (2017): Revision of the genus Vanenga Schaus, 1928 (Lepidoptera, Mimallonoidea, Mimallonidae) with the description of a new species. ZooKeys 644: 89-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.644.10705, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.644.10705
